content:
From: Abdullah <mr.ab15@gmail.com>
Dear All

I am looking for paper(s) talk about of temporal logic with isabelle,
if you know please send to me the title of paper or link if it
available on line.

Best Regards,

From: Stephan Merz <Stephan.Merz@loria.fr>
You may be interested in http://afp.sourceforge.net/entries/TLA.shtml, which develops an encoding of a variant of linear-time temporal logic in Isabelle/HOL. Depending on what you want to do, you will need to decide on whether you want a shallow or deep encoding of the temporal logic you are interested in.

Best regards,

Stephan Merz
